title: Infra Contradiction Detector
reason: We need this skill because long-term scale depends on resilient and sustainable infrastructure choices. This specific skill catches internal and external claim conflicts early.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Infra Contradiction Detector`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to capacity collapse and environmental debt.
Design and version the input/output contract for capacity forecasts, energy usage, and sustainability metrics, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using cross-claim consistency checks, and produce contradiction alerts with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover capacity collapse and environmental debt, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.

validationGates.check: All required input signals present and schema-valid
Repeated run on same inputs yields stable scoring and artifacts
Approval gates satisfied before publish-level outputs

knownFailures.action: Reject payload, emit validation error, request corrected payload
Freeze output, escalate to human approval router
Apply retry policy then rollback to last stable baseline
